summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackLike a refreshing green juice for the face, ELEMIS Superfood Facial Wash is a revitalizing gel wash, packed with vitamin-rich Superfoods for clean and glowing skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsIdeal for dull or lackluster complexions, this facial wash removes daily grime and deeply cleanses the skin for an outdoor-fresh glowLike a revitalizing green juice for your face, this refreshing daily cleanser is packed with nutrient-rich Superfoods, including Broccoli, Wheatgrass and Kale extractsThe balancing gel formula is also infused with an active Prebiotic to help to maintain a healthy balance in the skin's microfloraFormulated with Avocado and Pumpkin Seed Oil, this nourishing facial wash also leaves skin feeling hydrated, balanced and healthySuitable for removing make-up, including eye make-upKey IngredientsOrganic Pumpkin Seed Oil, rich in vitamins, essential fatty acids, antioxidants and sterols that can help protect the skin's lipid barrierBlack Seed Oil, rich in Omega 6, vitamins, antioxidants and amino acids to support the skin's lipid barrier for a healthy glowNettle Extract contains high levels of proteins and amino acids. Acts as a gentle astringent and has anti-inflammatory propertiesResearch Results97% agreed this product left skin feeling cleansed**Independent User Trials 2017. Results based on 120 people over 4 weeksItem 2577519How To UseUse every morning and evening.Step 1 - Massage into dry skin with fingertips.Step 2 - Add warm water to create a lather, then rinse off.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Glycerin, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Acrylates Copolymer, Polysorbate 20, Sodium Lactate, Coco-Glucoside, Glyceryl Oleate, Dicaprylyl Ether, Lauryl Alcohol, Sodium Chloride, Phenoxyethanol, Xanthan Gum, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Chlorphenesin, Sodium Hydroxide, Citric Acid, Fragrance (Parfum), Alpha-Glucan Oligosaccharide, Brassica Oleracea Italica (Broccoli) Seed Oil, Cucurbita Pepo (Pumpkin) Seed Oil, Galactoarabinan, Disodium EDTA, Salvia Hispanica Seed Oil, Limonene, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Caramel, Amyris Balsamifera Bark Oil, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Juice, Cymbopogon Martini Oil, Geraniol, Linalool, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Seed Oil, Brassica Oleracea Acephala (Kale) Leaf Extract, Triticum Aestivum (Wheatgrass) Leaf Extract, Magnesium Aspartate, Zinc Gluconate, Maltodextrin, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Chlorophyllin-Copper Complex, Hydrogenated Palm Glycerides Citrate, Tocopherol, Copper Gluconate, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Ascorbic Acid.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use every morning and evening.Step 1 - Massage into dry skin with fingertips.Step 2 - Add warm water to create a lather, then rinse off.

reviews.headline: My 3rd Time Purchasing
reviews.comments: I like this cleanser and have now purchased it 3 times.  I tend to switch brands but this one is definitely a winner for me.  I have 40's skin and some fine lines/wrinkles and a combo skin type.  This does not break me out, it's gentle but leaves my skin feeling clean.

reviews.headline: Irritated my face horribly!
reviews.comments: I bought this on the recommendation of an associate in Ulta after he saw the redness in my face.  I'm always up for a change, so i went with it. The first time that i used it, I noticed how "earthy" the smell is, but not a good earthy, I didn't like it. Luckily, the smell didn't stick around long. After several weeks of use, my skin felt horrible. My red cheeks were so dry that i was having trouble moisturizing them enough. Needless to say, I threw the face wash away and tried to restore the balance of my skin for the next months.

reviews.headline: This product smells delicious
reviews.comments: I highly recommend this yummy product. I bought it because of the sample that I received. this facial wash works great on my mature skin.

reviews.headline: Doesn't get makeup off
reviews.comments: Not bad but not my favorite. It doesnt remove makeup well, even non waterproof mascara. I like the formulation and dont mind the earthy smell. I got it during the sale but wouldnt pay full price.

reviews.headline: Favorite new face wash!
reviews.comments: I'm not nuts about the smell BUT, I Love how it cleans my face, it's even better than Clinique!

reviews.headline: Dried my skin / smell is so strong
reviews.comments: I've purchased a few items from this brand since I tried one of their pro collagen products and I really liked it however I have discovered that their smells are extremely overpowering such as this product. The pro collagen smells more like eucalyptus and fresh whole this smells different I can't explain the smell it's like a bad old lady perfume. I tried this a a few days and it overly dried my skin it just wasn't making my skin feel nice. I tried it with their rose oil and Holly Molly the smells combined actually gave me a migraine, also for reference my skin was so dried from the wash that no matter how much oil I applied it did not feel hydrated enough I had to return. I have normal skin I supposed more on the dry side

reviews.headline: Nasty smells
reviews.comments: Irritating and smelly . I can't belive so many people give them good  reviews . The color is nasty too ! Yucks

reviews.headline: So glad to have finished the bottle
reviews.comments:
I purchased this during the 50% off sale, thinking, *how bad could it be?* Unfortunately, it turned out to be the worst cleanser I've ever used. 

First, it burns your eyes. The packaging says to avoid the eye area, which I've never seen with a cleanser before. This is not only inconvenient but also challenging because you have to avoid your forehead as well to prevent it from dripping into your eyes. If you wear makeup, like I do, this makes it even less practical. 

On top of that, it never left my skin feeling truly clean. 

I would avoid this product at all costs.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: My sister give it to me for my birthday and i love it

reviews.headline: Refreshing Facial Wash
reviews.comments: Has a fresh, faint, herbal scent. Cleans without drying out my skin and leaves it feeling soft and fresh.  Very concentrated so a little bit goes a long way.

reviews.headline: Love this so much
reviews.comments: I saw this pop up as a 1-day special deal and grabbed it on a whim. It's one of the best impulse buys I've ever made. It smells amazing and my skin feels so good. I'll definitely be buying more when this gets low!

reviews.headline: Refreshing
reviews.comments: This has to be the most refreshing face wash i have ever used.

reviews.headline: Allergic reaction
reviews.comments:
I have never had an allergic reaction before from skin care but after one use of this my entire face and neck broke out in hives. 
I do not have particularly sensitive skin so I am not sure why this happened and I know a lot of people enjoy this product but if you happen to have an allergic reaction you are definitely not alone. I will be returning product.

reviews.headline: Skincare routine staple
reviews.comments: I have been using this for years, after initially receiving a sample of it. I like the natural scent even if it is a bit "earthy", and it's gentle yet effective. I use it every morning, and a different brand's exfoliating/acne cleanser nightly. The combo balances my mid-40s skin very well. While the bottle is pricey, it lasts for several months since you only need a pea-sized drop to clean your whole face. Lathers very well.

reviews.headline: My New Fav
reviews.comments:
I've gone through a lot of cleansers from drug store to more natural to more expensive. This one has been wonderful. 

The smell is whatever, but once I rinse it off, I don't smell it anymore. It didn't deter me, at least.

I noticed that my skin looked less irritated and smoother when using this. It wasn't a shocking difference, but enough for me to notice and feel more confident about going without makeup. I've never felt that stripped-of-all-oils kind of tightness and still, my pore look cleaner. If I wear makeup, I start with a Make Up Eraser cloth and then use this afterwards and it removes everything.

reviews.headline: Great cleanser
reviews.comments: Awesome priducts that goes on gently but cleanses deeply. I pair it with the moisturizer and end up with a glowy finish every time.

reviews.headline: Elemis Superfood Facewash LONDON UK ðŸ‡¬ðŸ‡§
reviews.comments: It's dusty and dry in the desert and I needed some GREEN â€¦ Shake it â€¦ then Lather up in the shower and walaa â€¦ removed everything. Refreshingly GREEN

reviews.headline: love it
reviews.comments: im in love with this. i use it every morning + night and it makes me feel so revitalized in the mornings. my only complaint is the price but other than that i love it

reviews.headline: My sensitive skin lovessss this
reviews.comments: I have extremely sensitive skin but this does not irritate it at all. It does an amazing job lathering and removing makeup. I highly recommend this!

reviews.headline: Facial wash
reviews.comments: Lathers up nice and goes on smooth.  My face feels refresh after.

media.headline: Superfood Facial Wash has saved my skin!
media.caption: Love the packaging easy to use in the shower!

media.headline: There's nothing I don't love about this product.

faceoff_positive.comments: I got this in December as a Christmas present and oh man, I love this product so much. I don't think I'll ever use anything else! Not only does it smell incredible, my skin as cleared up completely and leaves my face so soft and smooth. I recently purchased the Elemis Marine Cream moisturizer and the two together are a dream. I don't have any wrinkles yet (I'm only in my twenties), but the fine lines on my forehead are almost completely gone. I 100% recommend this product and the marine cream as well!
faceoff_positive.headline: Favorite Face Wash Ever!

faceoff_negative.comments:
Never in my life have I used a face wash that has given me so many huge, cystic breakouts before! If you have sensitive skin of ANY kind, DO NOT USE THIS! I would not even categorize my skin as sensitive but it reacted terribly to this product. 

I used this every morning for three days to wash off my nighttime oils and serums. The breakouts went from tiny clogged pores to MASSIVE breakouts in those three days. I stopped using this wash as it was the only new item in my routine. Once I did this, the breakout finally stopped forming but after a week I am still dealing with getting rid of them.

I would not recommend this product to anyone.
faceoff_negative.headline: Horrible breakouts from this!!!!
